home.parrafo-info: Systems engineering and programming student focused on Back-End Development. As a person with a passion for efficient and scalable systems, my goal is to create backend solutions that are not only robust and secure, but also designed to enhance the end-user experience. I specialize in building robust architectures and optimizing processes to ensure seamless performance that supports intuitive and aesthetically pleasing interfaces.

As a person with a passion for efficient and scalable systems, my goal is to create backend solutions that are not only robust and secure, but also designed to enhance the end-user experience. proyectos.title: Proyectos
proyectos.info-proyecto1: SynthWave is an accounting app for entrepreneurs and small businesses seeking simplicity and efficiency. It offers comprehensive tools to manage sales, inventories, and generate financial reports, facilitating business growth.
proyectos.info-proyecto2: My personal web portfolio, where you can find some of my most notable projects, my technical skills, and a bit about my background.
proyectos.info-proyecto3: A bot to manage support on Discord, allowing users to create tickets and receive assistance in private channels quickly and organized.
